name: Afterlife (itch) (DepressoMocha)
description:
How will you face your afterlife?

You woke up in a castle owned by... Death himself? And he said that you aren't supposed to be dead? What's happening?

Are you going to choose to live and going back to your normal life, or stay and find out their secrets?

Features:

- Gods! (No, just because they have horns, doesn't mean they're demons smh)

- A lot of choices, like, a lot of them. 

- Somewhat cool title screen.

- 5 Different endings to get! And 4 Cgs to get (You'll see why.)

- (Soon) Extras! Ask them about stuff related to the game, or just insert some secret passwords...

Optional, but if you're kind enough to drop some dollars, I'll add you in the list of available passwords!

Winner of the 1st Rabico! Game jam. The game is also available in Play store, but it's very outdated.  I can't update the Play store version because:

 1. The Rabico! server is... Well, pretty much dying, which means, i can't export it to .aab format, and...

2.  No access to pc...

And that's why i decided to upload it here.

Made from scratch with Rabico! Visual Novel engine, which is available in Play store!

Please let me know if there's some bugs, I'll try to fix it right away! 

Known bugs:

- Save/Load is kind of broken. It's a bug from the engine itself so, not sure how to fix it.

- New fate button sometimes won't respond/opens settings instead. Still trying to figuring out the problem...

- Some compatibility issues. Again, the engine is quite limited. Maybe i really should port it one day...

"It was your choice, after all."
